class.name: socketcan_bridge/SocketcanBridgeNodelet
class.description: socketcan ros nodelet that sends/receives message to/from socketcan interface.

class.name: socketcan_bridge/SocketcanToTopicNodelet
class.description: socketcan ros nodelet that receives message from socketcan interface.

class.name: socketcan_bridge/TopicToSocketcanNodelet
class.description: socketcan ros nodelet that sends message to socketcan interface.
